season_window.notes: Reigning 2024 national champions with heavy MLB departures.

ballpark.name: Lindsey Nelson Stadium
ballpark.recent_upgrades: Major renovation project under construction with expanded seating for 2025.

head_coach.name: Tony Vitello
head_coach.staff_tenure: Entering eighth season; delivered 2024 national title.
head_coach.playing_style: High-velo pitching and home-run heavy offense with swagger-driven culture.

nil_operations.recent_initiatives: Expanding baseball-specific 'BaseVols Club' experiences with player Q&As (Sept 2024).

historical_context.program_trend: Elite national power with top-tier NIL and facility investments underway.

intel_notes.summary: VolQuest reports staff expects sophomore LHP Drew Beam to anchor rotation with expanded workload.

data_quality.next_actions: Collect updated roster after MLB departures; verify NIL initiative details.
